License information

Joda-Beans source code is released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license. This is the same license as all Apache Software Foundation projects.

As is normal with the Apache 2.0 license, a NOTICE file exists for Joda-Beans: 

Joda Beans
Copyright 2001-2014 Stephen Colebourne

This product includes software developed by
Joda.org (http://www.joda.org/).
Copyright © 2007-2014 Joda.org. All Rights Reserved.
